channel.title: Help! "Error Connecting to Server!"
channel.description: Well I've been trying for three days now and this message comes up everytime... "Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "cancle" then "start server" to make your own." I've been trying many different ones for a while and I'm not sure what I'm doing wrong. I have it downloaded too and the webclient isn't working. This is my first itme playing. I just type in any name and any password and and a server I found on the list. If anyone can help that'd be great! Thanks!

item.title: Help! "Error Connecting to Server!"
item.dc:creator: @m0nsterb0ys m0nsterb0ys
item.description:
@m0nsterb0ys wrote:

This means the server must be down or crashed. If the server has hamachi u need to download it here http://www.hamachi.cc/download/ and download the one that fits ur computer. Also make sure the ip is right, and if the port is not defualt go to the top press file:new port: then enter the port.

U will know if the servers uses hamachi or not because on the server page where its being advertised it will say

Ham or Hamachi- yes or no

if yes the it should say under it
Network- (the name)
Pass- (the pass)

Read full topic

item.title: Help! "Error Connecting to Server!"
item.dc:creator: @Hassan_Rules Hassan_Rules
item.description:
@Hassan_Rules wrote:

Well I’ve been trying for three days now and this message comes up everytime…
“Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click “cancle” then “start server” to make your own.”
I’ve been trying many different ones for a while and I’m not sure what I’m doing wrong. I have it downloaded too and the webclient isn’t working. This is my first itme playing. I just type in any name and any password and and a server I found on the list.
If anyone can help that’d be great!
Thanks!

Read full topic
